name: The Biggest Loser: Ultimate Workout
description: This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   The Biggest Loser: Ultimate Workout brings a healthy lifestyle into the family living room as never before, providing new ways to play together and motivate each other through exercise, diet, stat comparisons and light-hearted competition.
